title: Example: RT-2: Vision-Language-Action Models [PLMR 2023]

definitions.PLMR: Proceedings of the 2023 Conference on Machine Learning Research

summary: The slide presents an example of RT-2 Vision-Language-Action Models by Google DeepMind. It includes a question about a robot's task, a diagram of a large language model, and a de-tokenization process with numerical values and angle changes.
